game.name: Dark Age Gladiator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An age of chaos where empires and monsters coexist. As a mere gladiator, step into the arena and carve your name in glory through blood and battle. A dark fantasy action RPG where sword and sorcery collide.
